name: Robot Rampage (itch) (ppm4587)
description:
Final project of Computer Degree 2013, A action game based in early '90 arcade game mechanics. Made in 3 months without study anything about video games.

Controls:
z or x to shoot
left arrow to left
right arrow to right
up arrow to jump

Psinopsis:
"Press Z or X to Start"
Everything beginning when Charlie (your best friend), make a parallel window to another dimension, to show it in the next scientifics expo. But accidentally is turned on and the window is focused to a planet in war. And worse, cross some army robots the window. Before run to hide him, Charlie calls you and ask for destroy the dimensions window and the robots that you can.
